entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High 12.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 12. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few showers. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight with a few showers. Snow level near valley bottom. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Snow level rising to 1000 metres in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the morning. High 10. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Monday 17 April 2023
